meanings.definition: the condition of having defective vision in dim light
meanings.sent1: In scotopias, it is hard to see clearly in the dark.
meanings.sent2: People with scotopias struggle to see well at night.
meanings.sent3: The owl joked that it must have scotopias because it couldn't find its way in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her scotopias turned the night into a mysterious, shadowy world.
meanings.sent5: The scotopias made the room so dark, it felt like a cave.

meanings.definition: a medical term for night blindness
meanings.sent1: Night blindness, also known as scotopias, can make driving at night dangerous.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnose scotopias when someone has difficulty seeing in low light.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that he had scotopias, so he always bumped into things after sunset.
meanings.sent4: Her scotopias turned the night into a black canvas with no stars.
meanings.sent5: The scotopias felt like a thick curtain blocking out the light.
